Blog.post: HEY!! ok... today... i was reading in the living room and then i heard my cell go off... guess who??? jamal.... yea ok... he hadn't called in like 2 weeks! i answer it and hes all "hey alexa whats shakin?? havent called ya in like a long time! whats been goin down?" "nothin just ya know... livin..." and how lame am i to say that to my x's best boi?? omg... im such a dork.... well anyway: "so my f-ball game is gonna be the 28th at Mel. stadium... so u should come..." "maybe i can.." "yea cuz, b/c ya'll need to kiss and get back together!!" "Jamal!! we're not gettin back together!!" meaning jason and i... "its just sooooo weird that he was all about you and now he doesnt say nothin..." "well... i guess thats the way it goes... im ok really...." "but ya'll were perfect 4 eachother...." "yeah... i dont care...: "well i do..." He's just way too good of a friend 4 jason!! i mean... omg hes just so sweet! but anyway.... apparently ever since jason and i ended he started goin' wit all these skanks... geeze i dont even know what i saw in him anymore.......................................... jerk and then Jamal said sumthin i didnt expect: "so... who u goin wit these days..." omg i wuz gonna die... my x's best boi... checkin on me.... geeze.... what iz this world commin to?? hmmm.... i mean i kinda liked jamal in the beginning b4 jason and i went out... but hmmmmm... wow this is just over the top!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! AHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!!! geeze........... now it comes down to one thing: should i go to the game?? reasons not to: -if and only if: he likes me........... he has a gf... what a GUY! -if i go wit jamal... jasons gonna flip out!! that much i know!! somethin ugly is gonna happen and ill feel soooooooo bad!!! reasons to: -if: he likes me.............. -i kinda like him.... *cough*cough* g2g...... more l8tr -lexa *if non of you all caught the hedding... ya... umm confusion..... is spelled wrog**.. yep... hence the word CONFUSION!! get it???? or maybe ur just confused.... hahaha... or not thats all good to.... yea... lolol... *cough* **spelled that wrong also... hahahahaha im sooooo funny... LAUGH! ... dorks....

Hello all... if there are any of you out there! It is I Alexa!! woohoo!! wow... to many bluberries..... To Corey: TAPIOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOCA!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! so hahahahaha 2 u!!! Hello Kendall!! if youre out there!! i am boredy bored bored bored!! *cricket*cricket*cricket*cricket* List of friends b/c i love them... and b/c i am (^) Kendall Corey Jared Mike Jacob Jeannine Terra Whitney Kalia Reuben DJ(Darren) Allisha Steven Crystal Josh... ha i wish... Josh (the hottness next door)- ha i wish again.... .......................................... I know I have 4gotten some but I am sucked into the hell of it all so I can't think straight! If you are wondering what "the hell of it all" is (which I know you are b/c I have yet 2 explain it) GOOD! Because I am about to explain it now(de ja vu....or how ever you spell it........) "the hell of it all" is : "the weirdness"- as explained in a really funny show O'grady- the unexplained force that forces us to behave oddly or insanly... ussually only happens in psyco teens such as myself and my friends... ----its not around all the time just sometimes when we all begin to think about happiness... haha what a surprise! going to eat someting....
urlLink My fave Celeb Hottie! Every since I saw Dirty Dancing: Havana NIghts... i've been OBSESSED!!!oh he's just so FINE!!!! urlLink

Hello all it is I!!!! The chick who own's this blog!! accept... you don't see this b/c no one has ever come to my site!!! but its cool its all good!!.... i'm fine..... *sniffle*sniffle* Thank God... Grandma is finally leaving!! Oh thank the Lord in Heaven!!!!!! WEEEEEEE!!!!! I love my Grandmother to death but all week she's bee here "looking after things while mom was in NY... and to say the least she got ANNOYING!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! "Clean up the kitchen!" "clean up your room" "get off that computer" BLAH BLAH BLAH BLAH BLAH BLAH BLAH BLAH BLAH BLAH!!! Praise the Lord... the hawk has left the building!!!!

Wow.... I'm so bored!!! Ok truth time: -this guy... the "new guy on the brain" I'm not sure I really like him yet... he is moderatly cute....but truth betold i know nothing about him... pft... im so vain!!! might call bestest buddy.... share my thoughts and feelings with her... bloddy hell i am bored!!

Here we go... Mom came back from New York and things are already starting to get moderatly stressfull. She's always telling Dad when he stresses out, which he does do, to stop it. But I'm not sure if she realizes that she too "stresses out" as they put it... Sometimes when they bicker I'd rather be anywhere but in this house. I'm one of those people who when two people or a group of people that I I know fight I get all upset and will eventually start crying. Sometimes Mom and Dad's arguments get so out of hand, I'd rather run Nutty-pants (naked) through the street! Wow.. how random was that??? Sometimes when I think about "the bloddy bloke who will remain nameless" I want to call him up a say ,"I'm sorry!! I'm so sorry!!! Whatever I did please forgive me and take me back!!!!" I know that's afully despret but (and I know this sounds WAY over dramatic but...) I feel almost LOST without him telling me I'm beautiful and that he loves me, and he wil always love me.... About the new kid on the brain: I don't know a lot about him seeing as we've only really met once.... haha... oh good Lord I'm despret............................................. But: anywho- he seemed really sweet not to mention he's pretty darn GORGEOUS! I could definatly see myself with him..... It was soooo funny b/c when we say the movie The Village the "monster's" were so scary! But I guess he didn't see them as scary b/c he leans over to me and says,"They look like mutant turkeys!!!!!" hahahahaha!!!! made me laugh out loud (untill the people behind me told me to shut up and kicked the back of my seat.... *cough*cough*)!!!!!!!!!!! all 4 now

Since the "break up" with "the bloody bloke whom will remain nameless"... for some odd reson I haven't been able to think of hardly anything else! Well you couldn't really call it a break up... it was more of let's force my bestfriend, who's girlfriend, by the bloody way, broke up with him the same way, to break up with the girl I claim to love, for me! I mean honestly man! How daft can you get? But even though he was horrible about the break up, and hasn't called since then to apollogize or somethin', I can't stop thinking about all the time that was spent with him... Oh Lord in Heaven, help me, I still have feelings for the boy who broke my heart in a million pieces and then stepped on it (and burned it in the burning fires of hell, and shot it down with a bebe, and ran over it with a Monster Truck, and killed it like a kid standding over an ant hill with a magnifying glass, and i guess you get the picture........ ) . It's been bloody boring the last couple of days... bloody hell! Summer's almost gone! Then I'll have to go back to "the jail cell". Mom says that if I don't get a's and b's the whole entire year she's gonna ship me off to some privet school... ughh... sometimes she is so unethical!! Sometimes it's as if she WANTS to ruin my life... Well enough complaining....... On the upside of my life: - I kinda like this one kid: He's the son of a guy who works for dad. I went to the movies with him and his little brother to see The Village (pretty bloody scary btw) and he's mega cute. AND he's spanish... ahhhhh!! idk... i have this thing 4 guys who can speek spanish fluently... idk its kinda hot when they do lol! well yea........... im gonna go more later when when i get restless and need some thots outty!! Love always....... ShortLexa
